title: Jail for Ex-Immigration Aide
body:
A former Immigration and Naturalization Service official was sentenced today to at least six months in prison for tax 
evasion and for accepting payoffs to help foreigners, many of them Iranians, file fraudulent immigration papers. 
Federal Judge Thomas A. Flannery imposed the sentence on Maron Sheehi, 55 years old, of Alexandria, Va.
Former Immigration and Naturalization Service official receives six-month sentence for tax evasion and accepting 
payoffs from foreigners
